about_the_game:
This DLC is meant for those who wish to go the extra mile to support the devs. This pack contains artwork that can be found in the game local files folder after download.

Features:
  • 32 .png source image files for the 16 comics used in-game.
  • Includes both no dialogue and with dialogue versions of each comic

Note that this DLC does not provide any additional gameplay elements

After purchase of this pack, you may use it's contents freely but you may not:
  • Credit yourself as the original creator.
  • Resell the original source images as it is with no added value (Using it in commercial blogs, games etc is fine).

How to use:
After downloading the DLC, use "browse local files" on the main app game. Then look for a folder named "Supporter Art Pack". All the image files will be there.
Alternatively, look for it in the Steam install folder manually, it could be something like this: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Legend Of The Ape\Supporter Art Pack"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and newer
  • Processor: 1.0Ghz
  • Memory: 50 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: A DLC meant for those who wish to go the extra mile to support the devs. It contains all 16 original source images for the comics used in-game. This pack does not contain additional gameplay elements.
